title: JW Wear - Days Text
summary: Bible Based days text on your Android Wear Device!
description: This Application allows the Days Text (Produced by the Watch Tower Bible and Tract Society)  to be read on any supported Android Wear DeviceFuture Updates ~Planned: Reminder to remind you to read the days text
descriptionHTML:
This Application allows the Days Text (Produced by the Watch Tower Bible and Tract Society) to be read on any supported Android Wear Device






Future Updates ~

Planned: Reminder to remind you to read the days text
comments: Perfect. Works great on ZenWatch 2. Just what I was looking for. Really like having Daily Text on my watch.
Looks OK but it doesn't open on phone to change language.
Well done! Please update this for 2017 text before the new year too! :)
recentChanges: No further progress on any of the other features, have had some crazy stuff go on, and almost lost the files for this app. But somehow I found them again and managed the painstaking process of transferring all the days text from the WOL.JW.ORG page back into this app.
